text: Nilphamari Medical College is a public medical school in Nilphamari, Bangladesh, founded in 2018 and affiliated with Rajshahi University. The class of the first batch of 50 students was commenced on January 10, 2019 on its temporary campus of Nilphamari Sadar Hospital. ==See also== * List of medical colleges in Bangladesh ==References== Category:Medical colleges in Bangladesh Category:Hospitals in Bangladesh Category:Nilphamari District
title: Nilphamari Medical College
